LED lights may keep great white sharks away from surfers, new study reveals https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/led-lights-may-keep-great-white-sharks-away-from-surfers-new-study-reveals/KOXDJKTXMJAMZA6NUCAWQ2XGBQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/led-lights-may-keep-great-white-sharks-away-from-surfers-new-study-reveals/KOXDJKTXMJAMZA6NUCAWQ2XGBQ/ NZ’s 'Shark Man' supports the research but warns it's not foolproof. Sun, 17 Nov 2024 00:17:20 +0000 A new study is offering hope for shark-fearing beachgoers after it was discovered that LED lights which could be attached to surfboards deterred great whites. Photo / Clinton Duffy

Photo / Alex Cairns

Geyser the kiwi dies in suspected dog attack, Ngāti Rangi ‘devastated’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/geyser-the-kiwi-dies-in-suspected-dog-attack-ngati-rangi-devastated/QXDTR7SURRECVMOTHPDECJOASA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/geyser-the-kiwi-dies-in-suspected-dog-attack-ngati-rangi-devastated/QXDTR7SURRECVMOTHPDECJOASA/ Kelvin McDonaldEven just one kiwi death can have a devastating impact on kiwi recovery, Helen Leahy said. Sat, 16 Nov 2024 22:54:57 +0000 Ngāti Rangi's Fred Clarke and DoC Biodiversity Ranger Jenny Hayward released Geyser the kiwi into Rangataua Forest in 2015.

Sat, 16 Nov 2024 22:37:43 +0000 A pensioner from a small town in Central Otago says she feels she was “fleeced” after being charged over $160 for a 20-minute taxi ride in Auckland.
